languages.text: "Вот за это спасибо! С такой насыщенной жизнью эпитафия мне однажды точно пригодится".
"Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I am certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."
languages.original_text: "Вот за это спасибо! С такой насыщенной жизнью эпитафия мне однажды точно пригодится".

traits.locale_text: "Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I'm certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."
"Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I'm certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."

"Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I'm certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."
"Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I am certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."
"Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I am certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."

languages.text: 「そうだな、感謝しよう！{mf|俺|私}の人生はこうもさまざまな出来事が起きる。いずれ確実に墓碑が必要になるだろうさ」
languages.original_text: "Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I am certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな、感謝しよう！{mf|俺|私}の人生はこうもさまざまな出来事が起きる。いずれ確実に墓碑が必要になるだろうさ」

languages.text: “啊，太谢谢你了！就算是如此丰富多彩的人生，某个时候也确实需要一首墓志铭。”
languages.original_text: "Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I am certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."

traits.locale_text: “啊，太谢谢你了！就算是如此丰富多彩的人生，某个时候也确实需要一首墓志铭。”

languages.text: "Oh, danke sehr! Bei einem so ereignisreichen Leben wie meinem werde ich sicher irgendwann einen Nachruf brauchen."
languages.original_text: "Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I am certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, danke sehr! Bei einem so ereignisreichen Leben wie meinem werde ich sicher irgendwann einen Nachruf brauchen."

languages.text: « Merci bien ! Avec la vie mouvementée que je mène, tôt ou tard, j'aurai besoin d'une épitaphe. »
languages.original_text: "Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I am certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."

traits.locale_text: « Merci bien ! Avec la vie mouvementée que je mène, tôt ou tard, j'aurai besoin d'une épitaphe. »

languages.text: «¡Caramba, gracias! Con una vida tan azarosa como la mía, es seguro que tarde o temprano necesitaré un buen epitafio».
languages.original_text: "Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I am certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."

traits.locale_text: «¡Caramba, gracias! Con una vida tan azarosa como la mía, es seguro que tarde o temprano necesitaré un buen epitafio».

languages.text: "Çok teşekkür ederim! Böylesi olaylı bir yaşam sürerken bir noktada mezar yazıtına ihtiyaç duyacağım kesin."
languages.original_text: "Why, thank you! With a life as eventful as mine, I am certainly going to need an epitaph at some point."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, teşekkür ederim! Böylesi olaylı bir yaşam sürerken bir noktada bir mezar yazıtına ihtiyaç duyacağım kesin."
